header.title: Tipper for best childhood memories
header.subtitle: Want to take a ride on this tipper trucks?

intro.text: As a mother of four, I like when my kids play by them self, have fun and are playing with safe toys.

heavyDuty.label: Heavy duty tipper
heavyDuty.text: The toy Tatra tipper truck can handle load up to 220lb (100kg). Not only the kids can have fun with them.

materials.label: Quality materials
materials.text: The truck is made with very durable and save plastic to ensure a lot of fun play time under any conditions.

madeInEU.label: Made in EU
madeInEU.text: Design and manufactured in Czech Republic for quality insurance.

safetyFirst.label: Safety first
safetyFirst.text: Our trucks are equipped with safety lock so that you can have a smooth ride.

outdoor.label: Outdoor ready
outdoor.text: Load everything from sand, pebbles or a friend and off you go.

ageLimit.label: 1 year+
ageLimit.text: The tipper truck is suitable for kids from one year.

label2.label: Come and play with us!
label2.text: We are currently working on our web shop byt if you can not wait contact us at info@toy-truck.co.uk.

comePlayWithUsVideo.text: This tipper stayed in my childhood memories and certainly will stay in those of my kids.
